result.purpose: Responsible for managing and processing token-related tasks for a proxy service, including crawling and task generation with rate limiting.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, with separate files handling distinct aspects of token task management and processing.

internal/domains/proxy/tasks/skynet_toke.purpose: Handles the crawling of Skynet tokens with rate limiting and task processing.

internal/domains/proxy/tasks/token_tasks.purpose: Generates and manages token tasks for processing in an asynchronous queue.

internal/domains/proxy/tasks/tokens.go.purpose: Handles token crawling tasks for a proxy service, including rate limiting and interaction with external APIs.
